name: Blocky Pixel Taxi Car Racing 3D
description:
It's Time TO Play Unique Blocky Pixel City Racing Game

Take your passengers safely through the blocky city! Dodge rivals who try to prevent your cab arrives at its destination!

Get ready for an unprecedented adventure in Blocky Pixel Taxi Car Racing. Your reputation as a safe and quick Blocky Taxi driver must not fall, but some cars and traffic are not going to put anything easy.

Choose from four models available your favorite Blocky Taxi. All are featured with a magnificent pixelated design.

Hit the race with your Blocky Taxi and driving at full speed on a road full of surprises!

The controls are very simple and you only have to move your mobile device sideways like a steering wheel. You'll feel totally at the controls of the Blocky Taxi!

Prevents energy bar runs out while you show that you are an as motor and you know every millimeter of the city!

Are you ready to save the passengers and earn money?

Features of this taxi racing game:

- Urban circuit
- 3 Blocky Taxi to choose
- Lovely graphics
- Amazing speed
- Score board
- Entertaining music

We like to get feedback from our users and know what they think about the games that we present. We hope your opinion!

Live a different experience in Blocky Pixel Taxi Car Racing!
